message.name: ERR_URL_ENCODING_ERROR
message.locale: An exception occurred during the encoding of the url being passed in the compare link for identical evidence.

message.name: ERR_CONVERSION_TO_DOM_ERROR
message.locale: An exception occurred when converting a struct to DOM representation.

message.name: ERR_IDENTICAL_EVIDENCE_XFV_ACCEPT_REJECT
message.locale: You have selected both 'Accept' and 'Reject' for the identical shared %1c.

message.name: ERR_IDENTICAL_EVIDENCE_ACCEPT_XRV_ALREADY_INEDIT
message.locale: This %1c record cannot be accepted as there is already an in edit %1c record with the same effective date present on the case.

message.name: ERR_IDENTICAL_EVIDENCE_ACCEPT_XRV_MULTIPLE_INEDIT
message.locale: You cannot accept more than one %1c record with the same effective date. Only one in edit %1c record with the same effective date can be present on the case.

message.name: ERR_IDENTICAL_EVIDENCE_ACCEPT_XRV_PENDING_REMOVAL
message.locale: This %1c record cannot be accepted. An active %1c record with the same effective date is pending removal.

message.name: ERR_IDENTICAL_EVIDENCE_ACCEPT_XRV_REMOVAL_PENDING_UPDATE
message.locale: The removal of this %1c record cannot be accepted. An active %1c record with the same effective date is pending update.

message.name: ERR_IDENTICAL_EVIDENCE_ACCEPT_XRV_REMOVAL_HAS_DEPENDANTS
message.locale: The removal of this %1c record cannot be accepted as it has one or more dependent records.

message.name: ERR_IDENTICAL_EVIDENCE_ACCEPT_XRV_REMOVAL_NOT_VALID
message.locale: The removal of this %1c record cannot be accepted. There is no corresponding %1c record to remove.

message.name: ERR_IDENTICAL_EVIDENCE_MULTIPLE_SYNCHRONIZATION_NOT_VALID
message.locale: You cannot accept more than one %1c record with the same effective date when there is a shared active record already on the case.

message.name: ERR_XML_PARSING_EXCEPTION
message.locale: An exception occurred parsing the XML evidence string for evidence synchronization.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_ACCEPT_ON_UNEVALUATED_STATE
message.locale: The '%1s' evidence cannot be accepted as it is in unevaluated state.
